channel.title: Do Weekly
channel.description: Short weekly episodes on building lasting healthy habits. Not through willpower or guilt, but by shifting who you believe you are. Hosted by Dr Robin Wang, clinical lead at Do Health.
channel.itunes:author: Dr Robin Wang
channel.itunes:summary: Short weekly episodes on building lasting healthy habits. Not through willpower or guilt, but by shifting who you believe you are. Hosted by Dr Robin Wang, clinical lead at Do Health.

item.title: Identity - You are what you repeat
item.itunes:title: Identity - You are what you repeat
item.description: What if the habits you struggle to build could feel as effortless as the ones you already have? Identity-based change means shifting who you believe you are, not just what you do.

item.title: Discomfort - Comfort is the trap
item.itunes:title: Discomfort - Comfort is the trap
item.description: We've engineered our lives to avoid discomfort. But comfort is where growth stops. The things that ask a little more of us make us feel alive. The discomfort is where the aliveness lives.

item.title: Savour - The forgotten skill of enjoyment
item.itunes:title: Savour - The forgotten skill of enjoyment
item.description: The good things are already in your life. You're just moving through them too quickly to feel them. This episode asks what happens when you stop rushing past the good bits and actually stay for them.
